comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9281?focusedCommentId=17148800) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
What do you mean? It's just waiting for RTools 4.0 to refresh its packages.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9281?focusedCommentId=17148827) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
That's not the only issue, and anyway R isn't using the new kernels yet, so it's wasteful to include them.
